creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Donald Winston
provenance:
Private collection, Germany.[1] Donald and Elizabeth Martin Winston, Los Angeles, California; gift to MIA in 1975.

[1] The work was exhibited with Galerie Goldschmidt [active c. 1910-1930], Frankfurt, Germany. It was also part of the Berlin Secession exhibition in 1913.
signed: UL in black: [LOVIS CORINTH.1886]; UL (in graphite, overlapped by other signature) [CORINTH/LOVIS 86]
title: Nude Girl
